headline: aliens land in windhoek
body: social media exploded with posts claiming that aliens landed near independence avenue in windhoek but no official source has confirmed this event

headline: namibia launches new solar energy project
body: president hage geingob inaugurated the largest solar farm in southern africa expected to power over 150000 homes

headline: namibia discovers gold in katutura
body: a viral whatsapp message claims that gold has been discovered in the streets of katutura causing people to dig holes overnight

headline: windhoek stadium renamed after cristiano ronaldo
body: an online blog falsely reported that independence stadium has been renamed after cristiano ronaldo

headline: namibia wins afcon 2025
body: windhoek  the brave warriors made history after defeating nigeria 21 in the afcon 2025 final fans across namibia celebrated the victory

headline: namibia strengthens ties with angola
body: the two countries signed new trade agreements focusing on renewable energy and transport development
